00006 //============================================================================
00007 //============================================================================
00008 template <class PRECISION> 
00009 inline typename PromotionOf<PRECISION,Real>::type
00010 Gaussian(
00011         const PRECISION& rWhere, const PRECISION& rMean, const PRECISION& rSigma
00012 ){
00013         static const Real grSqrt2Pi = 2.50662827;
00014 
00015         return exp(-1 * sqr((rWhere-rMean)/rSigma) / 2)/rSigma/grSqrt2Pi;
00016 }
00017

00019 //============================================================================
00020 template <class PRECISION> 
00021 inline PROMOTION(PRECISION,Real)
00022 Gaussian(
00023         const PRECISION& rWhere, const PRECISION& rMean, const PROMOTION(PRECISION,Real)& rSigma
00024 ){
00025         return Gaussian(
00026                 PROMOTION(PRECISION,Real)(rWhere),
00027                 PROMOTION(PRECISION,Real)(rMean),
00028                 PROMOTION(PRECISION,Real)(rSigma)
00029         );
00030 }

00035 template<int DIMENSIONALITY>
00036 ImageOf<Real,DIMENSIONALITY>* 
00037 GaussianCurve(
00038         const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,Real>& ptrSigma, 
00039         const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,int>& ptSupport
00040 )
00041 {
00042         typedef  PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY,int> POINT;
00043         typedef ImageOf<Real,DIMENSIONALITY> SRC_OUT;
00044 
00045         SRC_OUT* psrc = new SRC_OUT();
00046         psrc->Allocate(ptSupport);
00047 
00048         const POINT ptMean=ptSupport/2;
00049 
00050         forpoint(POINT,pt,0,ptSupport){
00051                 SetPoint(*psrc,pt,Gaussian(pt,ptMean,ptrSigma).CVolume());
00052         }
00053         HandoffPointer(psrc);
00054         return psrc;
00055 }
